item.title: Git Greenseer
item.description: A static git repository tool analyzer. It calculates the total contribution per category / project by developer and generates a report displaying charts with this information. It helps to understand which developers own or understand specific categories on the code. Html report shows: Contribution percentage by category. (shows a bar chart) Contribution per developer for each category. (shows a pie chart)
